name: Blorp!
description:
Blorp! was developed as part of the PunyJam #3 PunyInform Interactive Fiction competition.

It's a small interactive fiction, built around the Jam theme. For more details on PunyInform and the game jam, check out https://itch.io/jam/punyjam-3

This is a short adventure set in an underwater brewery. You left your rather expensive experiments in the hands of your friend Dave, but you know something isn't right. 

To play this game you can play online by clicking here or you can download the .z3 or .z5 file and use an interpreter such as:

Frotz for modern platform (Win/Lin/OSX)

M4ZVM for Trs-80 model 4 (model 1 & 3 also available)

Vezza for CP/M based machines

Ozmoo for C64/C128/MEGA64

Both z3 and z5 versions are provided to allow the broadest range of supported platforms. The z5 version is the same as the z3 version with the addition of text highlighting and the support for UNDO. 

Hope you enjoy!
